TopicTitle: Looking for a mod that has a specific part. help please?

Articles.Content:
So..for the life of me...I cannot remember which mod has this part. its a simple adapter, possiblly containing fuel. but it goes from  3m(circular) to a triple mk2(lined up like this). the intended purpose for the part is to be able to send up multiple mk2 sections in the same stack stage without having a super long rocket, or using a tri-adapter+3xmk2 adapters on each side of the mk2 sections.

can someone point me to the mod?? many thanks
Modding question moved to the modding subforum.

2 hours ago, Jesusthebird said:

So..for the life of me...I cannot remember which mod has this part. its a simple adapter, possiblly containing fuel. but it goes from  3m(circular) to a triple mk2(lined up like this). the intended purpose for the part is to be able to send up multiple mk2 sections in the same stack stage without having a super long rocket, or using a tri-adapter+3xmk2 adapters on each side of the mk2 sections.

can someone point me to the mod?? many thanks

I'm sure Kerbal Planetary Base Systems has something like this but for its own particular form factor.

Peace.

Edited January 12, 2018 by theJesuit
Spalling :)
Maybe you can find it in mk3 expansion mod. There's an adapter that fits 3 mk2 from a single stack

6 minutes ago, ARS said:

Maybe you can find it in mk3 expansion mod. There's an adapter that fits 3 mk2 from a single stack

ARS FTW! I had it installed...but was overlooked. darn, my mistake, wasn't a 3M part afterall
a mod can close this thread if they like, issue resolved
